title: Quotient of Topological Ternary Semigroup
authors: S. Samanta, S. Jana and S. Kar
abstract:
In this paper we introduce a quotient structure on topological ternary
semigroup by defining a congruence suitably. We have found conditions under
which this quotient structure becomes a topological ternary semigroup. We have
also obtained conditions that make this quotient a topological ternary group,
whenever the base structure is a topological ternary group.
